main event: Miss Mary Saunders, a housewife, observed a silvery white circular object hovering in the sky for about 5 minutes on 7 July 1952 in Rockville, Indiana.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 50-75 ft in diameter and made no noise during the sighting., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes before the object disappeared suddenly., The witness reported the sighting to the police, who then interviewed her., The weather conditions were clear with good visibility during the sighting., The analysis classified the object as unidentified.
